title: Your skin
creator_credit: World Wide Animation, Unilever Films and Ric Wylam
brief_description: A combination of animation and photography is used to describe the skin and its functions in simple terms. Some surprising facts and figures are given. The parts of the skin are shown and its growth explained. The film shows clearly the importance of hygiene in helping the body to resist infection.
